info.description:
Hi. My name is Tom, and I used to be a 16-year-old boy. Here's my story:

It was two weeks since my death: I died when a public bus collided with me in the crosswalk. I died instantly. Just seconds after the accident, I could see my body below me. I felt light, like a ghost, and when I found that out, you can imagine how I reacted. I began to float higher and higher into the air, so I panicked and grabbed tightly onto a billboard. A few hours passed, and I could feel myself drifting slowly down. It was at this moment when I became, not an angel, but a ghost. A real dead ghost. And a ghost is always a very lonely thing to be. I needed to feel the warm blood rushing through my soft flesh. I wanted to be alive again.
